law.catch_line: Prohibited practices in replacement or repair of automobile glass -- Penalties.

text.section: No person selling or engaged in the sale or installation of replacement glass shall advertise, promise to provide, or offer any coupon, credit, or rebate to pay all or part of an insurance deductible under a property and casualty insurance policy.

This section shall not be construed to require an insurer to pay more for automobile glass replacement, or glass repair services or glass products than the lowest price available in the market area provided by a qualified, competent glass repair company.
Violation of this section shall be subject to penalties as provided in KRS 304.99-020.

law.history: Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 410, sec. 1, effective July 14, 1992.
